changeSet.sql:
create table user_ ( id bigserial primary key, username varchar(100), password varchar(100), email varchar(500), phone varchar(50), gender smallint, date_of_birth DATE, addess varchar(500), status smallint, fullname varchar(100), created_by varchar(100), created_date timestamp, last_modified_by varchar(100), last_modified_date timestamp );
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX user_username ON user_ (username); CREATE UNIQUE INDEX user_email ON user_ (email); CREATE UNIQUE INDEX user_phone ON user_ (phone);
